Morotomo (With Thou)  \nNewly promoted managing director Masaru is besieged by the demands of work and married life. He has little patience for young half-brother, Yukio, a struggling writer. Yukio's carefree attitude to life leaves Masaru fuming, but it's his overfamiliar behaviour that leaves Masaru bothered in more ways than one.  \n  \n2. Jingi Nashi! (Without Honor!)  \nInept yakuza Sekiguchi loves getting arrested, for it's his best chance to get up close and personal with no-nonsense detective Murata. But when Murata warns him about the imminent closure of his gang, Sekiguchi faces an uncertain future. Can a guy who fantasizes about fondling the nipples of macho men in handcuffs ever go straight?  \n  \n3. Seinaru Otoko (The Holy Man)  \nPastor Andy, a missionary on a remote island, finds the brawny Taka washed up on the beach. Taka is the exact opposite of him in every way: a tough, brutish lout engaged in drug trafficking. Despite the danger, Andy offers Taka shelter and assistance - but his acts of Christian kindness conceal a dark obsession of his own.  \n  \nExtra: Matta Nashi! В Східно-Китайському морі пірати, найняті російською мафією, захоплюють його корабель, щоб викрасти секретну інформацію, яка міститься на диску. Самого Рокуро пірати після штурму беруть в заручники, в надії дістати з його компанії винагороду за збереження життя їх співробітника. Але захоплена інформація виявляється настільки компрометуючою, що бізнесмени вирішують знищити і піратів і Окаджіму, щоб «замести сліди». Дивом залишившись в живих, Рокуро, або Рок (як назвав його голова викрадачів — Датч), вирішує приєднатися до піратів і стає матросом на торпедному катері «Чорна лагуна».\n\nКатер належить маленькій, але добре відомій компанії з доставки вантажів «Лагуна», якій «інколи доводитися порушувати закон». This event would be later known as the First War of Magic.  \n  \nAfter the war, the Novus Orbis Librarium (also referred to as \"The Library\" or the \"NOL\") was created to govern the world with the use of Ars Magus. A great deal of dissent was caused by the Library, partly due to Ars Magus' use in nearly every facet of society, and the widening socioeconomic gap between those who could and couldn't use Ars Magus. This dissent would eventually form years later into the Second War of Magic or also known as the Ikaruga Civil War, when the city of Ikaruga openly rebelled against the NOL. Upon winning the war, the NOL imposed a harsher rule on the world, punishing any rebellion against the NOL with death.  \n  \nIn December A.D. 2199, several years after the Second War of Magic, a branch of the NOL was utterly destroyed by an SS-class rebel named \"Ragna\" also known as the \"Grim Reaper\", in an attempt to destroy the Librarium. The NOL, hoping to stop him, immediately announced the largest bounty ever, available to anyone who could capture him. Interestingly, Ragna possesses a powerful form of Ars Magus known as the \"Azure Grimoire.\" This led the NOL, as well as the other fighters, to hunt Ragna not just for his bounty, but also his Azure Grimoire.  \n  \nBlazBlue - Chimelical Complex, is the manga adaptation of BlazBlue - Calamity Trigger, the hit fighting game developed by Arc System Work."},"links":{"al":"57085","ap":"blazblue-chimelical-complex","kt":"20599","mal":"27085","mu":"55700"},"originalLanguage":"ja","contentRating":"safe","tags":[{"id":"391b0423-d847-456f-aff0-8b0cfc03066b","name":{"en":"Action"}},{"id":"b9af3a63-f058-46de-a9a0-e0c13906197a","name":{"en":"Drama"}},{"id":"cdc58593-87dd-415e-bbc0-2ec27bf404cc","name":{"en":"Fantasy"}},{"id":"ee968100-4191-4968-93d3-f82d72be7e46","name":{"en":"Mystery"}}]}

Quando acordei, eu estava numa cela de prisão?! Sobreviva! Droga, eu não sei! 10 anos depois, voila! Me tornei o melhor na cela. A propósito, o cara novo é homem? But I remember all of the CSAT problems that I encountered while studying and the stock market graph I saw while working as a stockbroker...?! For Kim Hajin, it’s nothing short of a nightmare. \n\nWith no clue how or why he’s been transported into his web novel — as a mere extra, no less! — Hajin has little choice but to see his story through until the end. V centru dění stojí agentura Hellsing, tajná společnost, zasvěcená ochraně Britského impéria před nadpřirozenými hrozbami. Ředitelkou této agenturu je mladá a odhodlaná lady Integral Fairbrook Wingates van Hellsing, která vládne nejen pomocí své železné vůle, ale také pomocí svých věrných spojenců – Alukard, upír s temnou minulostí a znepokojivě ničivou silou. Viktorie Serasová, mladá naivní policistka, která se upírem stala teprve nedávno a Walter C. Dornez, starý anglický komorník, jehož síla a moudrost nemusí být na první pohled zcela patrná.\n \nPříběh sleduje střet mezi Hellsingem a jeho nepřáteli, ať už jde o šílené upíry, fanatické náboženské organizace či dlouho zapomenuté síly, jenž se vymykají běžnému lidskému chápání. Temná atmosféra, výstřední postavy, akce a břitký humor dodávají příběhu jedinečný rytmus, kde krveprolití, vtip a hlubší podtóny jdou ruku v ruce.","en":"Vampires exist. It is the duty of Hellsing, an organization sponsored by the British government, to hide that frightening fact and protect the blissfully unaware populace. Along with its own personal army, Hellsing also has a few secret weapons. Alucard, an incredibly powerful vampire, has been controlled by Hellsing for years. Although he dislikes being a servant to the Hellsing family, he certainly enjoys his job as Hellsing's vampire exterminator. Seras is a fledgling vampire and a former police woman. Although reluctant to embrace her new self, she is still a valuable member of the organisation. Integra Hellsing, the current leader, is usually fully capable of fulfilling her duty, but lately, vampire activity has been on the rise. Unfortunately, the cause is more alarming than anything she could have imagined. A group long thought dead has been plotting in secret since their apparent destruction over 50 years ago. Plotting to plunge England, and perhaps the entire world, into war.  \n\n\n---","es":"La familia Van Helsing ha sido la némesis del conde Drácula y de toda la raza de vampiros.Ahora se ha convertido en toda una organización cuyo mejor cazador,un vampiro,usará el humor y la violencia para cumplir su destino...y ha dado origen a una exitosa serie de animación.","es-la":"Llega uno de los mayores éxitos de los últimos años! Su principal arma es Alucard, un sádico vampiro liberado por Integra después de años de reclusión. Junto a él, Victoria Seras, una chica policía ahora mitad vampiro. El peligro? Но, как ни странно, Алукард и Хеллсинг прекрасно работают вместе… и будут работать ровно до тех пор, пока древний вампир не найдет для себя действительно могущественного и интересного врага.","tr":"Hortlaklar, vampirler, canavarlar... Üstelik bunları kullanan kişi tam bir vampir uzmanı. Hellsing sizi aksiyon ve kan yüklü bir dünyaya davet ediyor.\n\nBu sayıda Hellsing Organizasyonu'nun avlarıyla ve düşmanlarıyla tanışıyoruz. Hiç beklenmeyen bazı gelişmeler, Integra Hellsing'in tüm planlarını bozuyor. Üstelik, kurumun yakın geçmişinde yaşanan güç oyunları ve entrikalar da karşımıza çıkıyor. When I was born, Mom's wrongdoings have already been revealed leading to her confinement in the tower, and soon she'll receive a miserable death at the hands of the main characters. I held her hand while looking over my mother who searched for her ex-husband until her dying breath. My small hand entwined Mom's rough one and she finally turned to me with a warm gaze.\n\n\"I understand you, Mom.\"\n\n\"...\"\n\n\"Don't struggle anymore, and rest well.\"\n\nAnd don't wait for something like Dad who won't come. At my words, a tear fell from my mother's eye and soon, she comfortably rested. As the novel's villainess is dead, I, her daughter, will also die tomorrow night by those people. And then the second part of the novel will start. A novel where the main characters go on adventures, love and become happy at the first part. But I don't want to die and I have no thoughts of letting the second part flow as it is.\n\n\"It's fine even if I'm this mean.\"\n\nIt's a life where I don't know when I'd die anyway, so might as well change how the novel's second part goes.\n\n---\nBorn as the daughter of a villainess, Daphne lived her entire life hated by everyone she's ever crossed paths with. 6fd5cf84-0974-4839-8968-3eb9729b74be:::||@!@||:::2023-11-01T10:00:00:::||@!@||:::{"id":"6fd5cf84-0974-4839-8968-3eb9729b74be","title":{"en":"Ano Hi Chikyuu ni Dungeon ga Shutsugen Shita"},"altTitles":[{"ja":"あの日地球にダンジョンが出現した"},{"en":"That Day Dungeons Appeared on Earth"}],"availableTranslatedLanguages":["en"],"description":{"en":"One day, a huge dungeon appeared all over the world.
